channel.title: Need help with Tormented Deamons! please look!
channel.description:
okay added the moddels and the Int compiled and everything is ok i went to autospawn.cfg spawned it but when i run my server here's what comes up
Loaded WorldMap In (94 ms)... Your server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8350 at NPCHandler.newNPC(NPCHandler.java:2215) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1981) at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:550) at server.main(server.java:167)

item.title: Need help with Tormented Deamons! please look!

item.title: Need help with Tormented Deamons! please look!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Rocky2k10:

Okay wtf? So can any1 sort this out for me please? LOL i dont understand a thing u both on about above lol

What we’re trying to say is java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException is being thrown because you didn’t use tabs while creating the NPC, or the number 8350 is to high.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Tormented Deamons! please look!

item.title: Need help with Tormented Deamons! please look!
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:10, topic:359237”][quote author=oniscape link=topic=455713.msg3337536#msg3337536 date=1284072360]
I know the problem, you don’t
[/quote]

Then help him instead of making a worthless post.

@OP
Use tabs instead of spaces.
The meaning of this error is you’re trying to access an index in an array that’s beyond the array’s capacity.[/quote]

Exactly what I said. But elveage flamed like a douche.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Tormented Deamons! please look!

item.title: Need help with Tormented Deamons! please look!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

oniscape:

I know the problem, you don’t

Then help him instead of making a worthless post.

@OP
Use tabs instead of spaces.
The meaning of this error is you’re trying to access an index in an array that’s beyond the array’s capacity. (P.S. Not sure if thats right in this sort of situation kind of rusty :p)

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Tormented Deamons! please look!

item.title: Need help with Tormented Deamons! please look!
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:8, topic:359237”][quote author=oniscape link=topic=455713.msg3337536#msg3337536 date=1284072360]
Well heres a start since these newbs don’t know what the error says.

Basically in the NPCHANDLER.java there is an array that keeps all the drops for the array. The NPCID you posted is too high, therefore it is out of bounds of the array. Pretty simpleh?
[/quote]

Stop talking. Please. Your going to confuse him more.[/quote]

I know the problem, you don’t

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Tormented Deamons! please look!

item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Make sure your using the “tab” button instead of the space bar. And make sure your not editing it on an IDE, or will it convert tabs to spaces.

Also, this is NOT a help section.

Read full topic
